participant_1.name: Alex Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and environmentally conscious, enjoys sharing experiences with friends.
participant_1.background: I was able to use my fireworks collection to put on an amazing fireworks show for my friends. I own a custom upholstery shop. I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats. My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp. I watch youtube videos.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Sociable and responsible, values family and community, has a sense of adventure.
participant_2.background: I drive a van because it's spacious and I can take my friends along to watch Scooby Doo at the drive-in theater. I am a doctor. My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion. I have a vacation home in the mountains. I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment.

content.text: I'm a big fan of fireworks, I have a huge collection in my garage. I put on an amazing fireworks show for my friends last weekend!
That sounds awesome! I wish I could see that. I love watching fireworks at the drive-in theater. I take my friends along every year.
Really? That's a cool idea. I should do that sometime.
Oh, you should! It's a lot of fun. And it's a great way to spend time with friends.
I also have a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
That's so nice of you! I wish more people were like that.
Yeah, I try to do my part to help out.
I think that's great. What do you do for a living?
I own a custom upholstery shop.
Oh, that's cool! Do you enjoy it?
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I get to work with my hands and I get to be creative.
That's great! It sounds like you have a great job.
Thanks! I do. I'm really happy with it.
